sentences.sentence: Oh - I can't tell you the arguments my wife will have with me over these durn night lights!
sentences.translation: 哦-我不能告诉你的论点，我的妻子会与我有对这些亚杜兰夜间照明灯！

sentences.sentence: One of the defendants, Franklin Durn, drives a Ferrari; in partnership with another, he owns a petrochemical firm which has contracts with PDVSA.
sentences.translation: 其中一名被告Franklin Durn开一辆法拉利汽车，他的石化公司与委内瑞拉国家石油公司PDVSA有合作关系。
